backend/main.mo: Backend actor defining user profiles, permissions, and extensive resident-related data types with health/status queries and profile CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI transparency fixes and global styling safeguards to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend files describing key components, modals, pages, CSS, hooks, and configuration behavior.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v22-to-pro: Release notes documenting promotion of Draft Version 22 to production with checklists and verification steps.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v27-to-pro: Release notes for promoting Draft Version 27 to production, outlining steps, checklists, and rollback plan.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode, and base styles using Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the app root and favicon with script entry point to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing and boot logic, handling identity, actor creation, profile loading, and retry flows with error toasts.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays ADL records for a resident and allows adding new records via a modal when permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating a new ADL record, submitting fields to the backend.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Renders detailed boot‑time error diagnostics and provides retry and logout options.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Guides new users through completing their profile, including role and related resident IDs.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Displays the Moritz Care Home logo with size variants.
Provides authenticated and login layouts with identity handling and logout/login controls.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident's MAR records, allows adding new entries when permitted, and shows them in a table with medication names resolved from fetched data.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal for creating a new MAR record, providing medication selection, date/time, staff name, and optional notes before submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/medications/admi: Defines the fixed list of medication administration routes and provides a helper to include nonstandard existing values.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medications with details, edit/discontinue actions, and physician lookup, optionally allowing additions.
Displays a medication list for a resident with edit/discontinue options and supports adding or editing medications through modal dialogs.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal for adding a medication with fields for dosage, route, times, physician, notes, and PRN handling, then submitting via mutation.
Modal for editing an existing medication, allowing updates to details, administration times, PRN state, and physician before saving.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Renders a badge showing a resident's code status, styled differently for DNR or Full Code.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal form for creating a new resident, including personal info, physicians, contacts, pharmacy, insurance, and medications.
Modal for editing an existing resident’s basic info, physicians, and pharmacy details with tabbed sections.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a printable resident profile report with demographics, physicians, medications, and code status.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a table of a resident’s recorded daily vitals and provides a button to add new entries.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for entering and submitting a new set of daily vital sign measurements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation of a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, stats, and access-controlled resident lists via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor that auto-retries initialization and re-initializes on identity changes, with optional secret-based access control.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with a healthcare-themed OKLCH palette, enforced solid backgrounds for UI popovers, dark mode variables, and print-specific styles.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Contains helper functions for checking user permissions and mapping user types to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Resident dashboard displaying resident stats, filtering and sorting tools, and an interface to add and navigate residents.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Renders the resident profile with tabs, medication actions, and multiple modals, handling permissions and data loading.
frontend/src/utils/dateOnly.ts: Provides date-only parsing and age calculation utilities to avoid timezone issues.
frontend/src/utils/errorDiagnostics.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into structured diagnostics and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, container, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project state and requirements focused on removing UI transparency and addressing connection issues.
